title: Loading from load card
instructions: Tap Load Card -> Enter PIN when in dialog or voice call prompt -> Wait for SMS reply confirming promo subscription

title: Updating balance
instructions: Tap the update button at the balance info status bar located at bottom -> Wait for SMS reply to update balance

title: Check Balance information
instructions: Tap Check Balance info -> A dialog shows current balance info from recent SMS reply

title: Subscribing to a promo
instructions: Tap Promos -> Select a promo category -> Tap a promo to send and subscribe

title: Bookmarking promo
instructions: Tap Promos -> Select a category -> Long press a promo to show dialog prompting to add promo to bookmarks -> See Bookmarks to view promos added

title: Unbookmarking promo
instructions: Tap Bookmarks -> Long press a promo to remove it from bookmarks

title: Sharing load amount
instructions: Tap Share Load -> Enter receiver phone number and load amount then confirm sharing load

title: Go to carrier site services
instructions: Tap carrier logo to access carrier site services
